product.name: Black Sideboard Cabinet with 2 Rattan Doors, Rattan Buffet Cabinet with Adjustable Shelves & Pine Legs, Boho Sideboard Buffet for Dining Room, Kitchen, Living Room(Black,1 PC)
product.description:
LFGUIZO, a brand born from a love for craftsmanship, specializes in creating exquisite, wooden, assembly-required furniture.
Each piece is a testament to our dedication to quality, sustainability, and timeless design.
Discover the art of storage with LFGUIZO, where every furniture is a story of elegance and functionality.
Buffet cabinets help you better store your daily necessities and make your room clean and tidy. Create a relaxed and comfortable home environment for you and effectively improve your life happiness index.
Accomodate various items like exquisite desserts,display items,kitchen dinnerware...
The shelves inside the cabinet can be adjusted to 3 different heights.
Adop the P2 MDF,the tabletop is durable and adds more storage space.
Sideboard door fronts are made from rattan, which has a hollow effect is highly breathable.
Strong load-bearing capacity and excellent stability, ensuring long-term use.
The solid wood feet of this entry cabinet provide exceptional stability.And the 5.24 inches height allows for easy robot vacuuming.
The inclusion of an anti-tip kit in this hallway cabinet provides peace of mind and prevents accidental tipping over or instability.
The two-door storage cabinet can be used next to the sofa for easy access to your items.
Buffet cabinets can be placed in kitchen to store items such as pots, plates, cutlery or microwaves.
The sideboard can be used as a accent cabinet or bedside table.
The cabinet can be placed at the entrance to store various items and tidy up your space.
What should I do if there are missing or damaged parts?
Please confirm the numbers or letters of these parts according to the instructions and take some photos, which will help us assist you more accurately.
What should I do if I don't find the instruction in the package?
Please rest assured that you can view the PDF electronic manual on the website. If necessary, we can also send you the digital manual in PDF format.
Why does the sideboard cabinet I received look different from the one shown in the pictures?
Due to lighting and screen settings, actual colors may slightly differ from photos, we aim for accuracy, but minor discrepancies may happen.
How to complete the assembly?
Come with detail numbered accessories and easily following to assembly. If you encounter any problems during the assembly process, you can refer to our installation video, and our professional team is readily available to provide prompt assistance.
What are package contents? How long will it take?
1 x Sideboard Cabinet, 1 x Instructions, 1 x Accessory Kit; It will take about 30-40 mins.
2 Door Sideboard, 1 PCS
2 Door Sideboard, 2 PCS
2 Door 3 Drawer Sideboard
4 Door Sideboard
2 Door 3 Drawer Sideboard
3 Door 3 Drawer Sideboard
2 Door Sideboard, 1 PCS
product.bullet_points:
• [Ergonomic Design with Optimal Height] This black rattan sideboard buffet is designed with an ergonomic height for easy use. It maximizes storage space while allowing ample room underneath for cleaning, keeping your home tidy
• [Spacious Top Surface & Flexible Shelves] The boho sideboard buffet features a large tabletop that can easily hold a 0.9 cu. ft. microwave, coffee maker, and other small appliances. The adjustable shelves inside can be customized to 3 levels height and can be removed when needed, offering versatile storage solutions
• [Floor-Friendly & Noise-Free] With pine legs, this black cabinet is gentle on your floors, preventing scratches and eliminating the noise from metal legs. It adds a stylish touch while keeping your home quiet and pristine
• [Size Reference] 4-Door Cabinet:This 4-door black rattan sideboard buffet is perfect for a 65" TV. 2-Door Cabinet:2 sets of 2-door cabinets can fit a 65" TV, while 3 sets can accommodate a TV up to 100". 2-Door 3-Drawer Cabinet:This boho sideboard buffet with a 2-door 3-drawer design is ideal for a 43" TV. Both drawers and compartments can store A4-sized books and other items, offering versatile storage solutions
• [Easy Assemble] Our boho sideboard buffet is easy to assemble. It comes with clear instructions and all necessary hardware, making setup simple and hassle-free, even for beginners
